title: Versions of the Past: Novels, Comics and Movies
description: An introduction to historical novels, comics, movies, memoirs and autobiographies as forms of historical representation in the contemporary U.S. Exploration of the vision of American history that each work presents and the truth-claims made for that particular vision. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and D1
